name: Slash Hero
description:
Slash Hero's mechanic prototipe, a game focused on remember action as Shoot em up games. Adding some frantic characteristics for placing enemy action at your disposition

None art of this game was made for me, all rights reserved from their respective creators

The game had art from: 

Megaman X2 (Snes), Megaman X6(PsOne) Megaman XZ Advent (NDS) Pokemon Mystery Dungeon:Red Rescue Team and Blue Rescue Team (GBA/NDS) The Legend of Zelda:Minish Cap (GBA) Strikers 1945 III (Arcade)

If in this list is missing some propertary of art, all rights reserveds goes to you
